fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Loose Lips: The first time you whisper with someone, learn their correct faction (75% chance) or an incorrect faction (25% chance) at the end of the phase. 
- Extort: Learn a playerâ€™s name. The room they went to last night was with a true Chaos member (may be themselves). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Converse: Pick a player. If they win with you, gain a channel use at the end of the phase. Influencable. [2 uses, 4 CD, Astral, Unlocks D3]
- Secrets: Pick a player. Learn if they have a private chat open (faction chat, trade, whispers, etc) at the end of the phase. [1 uses, Astral, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Tips: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
